'''Marana's Avatar''' is a quest-exclusive boss encountered during the ''[[For All Children Who Long for Life]]'' World Quest.

==Abilities and Attacks==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Attack 1
|desc_1      = Repeatedly releases large waves around itself covering the entire arena, dealing '''10% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Physical DoT}}. During this attack, [[Arama]] will lead the player to a [[The Withering|Tumor of the Withering]]. When the Tumor of the Withering is destroyed, this attack will end and the Marana's Avatar will become paralyzed.

|name_2      = Attack 2
|desc_2      = Summons waves of 3 bubbles that mark an area on the ground before striking down, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Physical DMG}}.

|name_3      = Withering Light
|desc_3      = Summons multiple lasers that strike the ground, rapidly dealing '''10% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Physical DoT}} before causing a massive explosion, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Physical DMG}}. During this attack, Arama will create a barrier that protects the player from it.
|file_3_2    = Marana's Avatar Withering Light 2
|caption_3_2 = Protected

|name_4      = Phase 2
|desc_4      = In the 2nd phase, the Marana's Avatar will repeatedly use '''Attack 2''' while summoning waves of [[Riftwolves]].
}}
